termsOfSale.title: Terms and conditions of sale
termsOfSale.seoDescription: Terms and conditions of sale and purchase.
termsOfSale.content:
Scope

These General Terms and Conditions of Sale (GTC) govern the sale of refurbished Dyson products offered on this site. By placing an order, the customer accepts these GTC without reservation.

Refurbished products

Products are refurbished: tested, cleaned and restored. They come with a commercial warranty as stated on each product page.

Price and VAT

Prices are displayed in the site currency including VAT. Delivery charges may apply as shown at checkout.

Payment

We accept card payments (Stripe) and, depending on configuration: crypto (Coinbase Commerce), TWINT. Payment is due at order. Payment data is processed securely.

Delivery

Delivery times and costs are shown at checkout. The customer must provide an accurate delivery address.

Right of withdrawal (14 days)

Under EU and Swiss law, you have 14 days from receipt to exercise your right of withdrawal. Contact us and return the product in its original condition. Refund will be made within 14 days of receipt of the return.

Warranties

In addition to legal warranties, our refurbished products come with a commercial warranty as detailed on the product page.

Liability and disputes

Our liability is limited to the order amount. In case of dispute, we will seek an amicable solution. Applicable law: Switzerland / EU as per the publisher's seat.

privacy.title: Privacy policy
privacy.seoDescription: Privacy policy and personal data protection (GDPR).
privacy.content:
Data controller

The data controller is the site publisher (see legal notice).

Data collected

We collect data necessary for orders (identity, address, email), payments (Stripe / providers), and customer relations. Browsing data may be collected via cookies.

Purposes

Order fulfilment, account management, customer service, billing, legal obligations, and with your consent: marketing, analytics.

Legal basis

Contract performance, consent (newsletters, non-essential cookies), legal obligation, legitimate interest (security, service improvement).

Retention

Order and billing data: as required by law (e.g. 10 years). Account data: while the account is active.

Your rights (GDPR)

Right of access, rectification, erasure, restriction, portability, objection. Contact us. You may lodge a complaint with your supervisory authority.

Cookies and third parties

Necessary cookies for operation; optional cookies (analytics, marketing) with consent. Stripe for payments; services such as Google (Analytics, Gemini) as configured.

Security

Technical and organisational measures to protect your data (HTTPS, limited access, secure passwords).

returns.title: Return and refund policy
returns.content:
Return period

14 days from receipt to notify your decision to return. The product must be sent back within a reasonable time.

Conditions

Product in original condition, unused (or reasonable trial), original packaging if possible. Accessories and documents included.

Refund

Within 14 days after receipt and inspection of the return, via the same payment method. Return shipping may be at your expense unless otherwise agreed.

Non-eligible products

Certain legal exceptions (customised products, unsealed for hygiene, etc.) may apply; see product page.

Procedure

1. Contact support (email or contact form).
2. We provide the return address and instructions.
3. Pack and ship with proof of shipment.
4. Inspection then refund.

Return address

Provided after your request and on the Contact page.

terms.title: Terms of use
terms.seoDescription: Terms of use of the site and services.
terms.content:
Access

Access to and use of the site are subject to these terms. By accessing the site, you accept them.

User account

Creating an account is optional (guest checkout available). If you create an account, you are responsible for keeping your credentials confidential and for all activity under your account.

Content ownership

Site content (texts, images, logos) is protected by intellectual property law. The Dyson brand and products are trademarks of their respective owners.

Prohibited use

Illegal use, compromising security, identity theft or harming the service are prohibited.

Limitation of liability

We strive to keep the site up to date and secure. We do not guarantee uninterrupted availability. Our liability is limited to foreseeable direct damages as permitted by law.

cookies.title: Cookie policy
cookies.seoDescription: Information about cookies and how to manage your preferences.
cookies.content:
This site uses cookies for operation, audience analysis and, with your consent, marketing.

Necessary cookies

They are essential for the site (session, cart, language, security). They cannot be disabled.

Analytics cookies

They allow us to measure audience and usage. They are optional and only set with your consent.

Marketing cookies

They may be used for relevant ads or retargeting. They are optional and only set with your consent.

Managing your choices

You can change your preferences at any time via the cookie banner or this page. Consent is stored for 12 months.

See our Privacy policy for more on cookies and your rights.
